pages.text: Rotational Complex are part of the $(l:multiblocks/turbine)Industrial Turbine$(/l) multiblock.$(p)Every $(l:multiblocks/turbine)Industrial Turbine$(/l) require one Rotational Complex, and it must be on top of the final $(l:blocks/turbine/turbine_rotor)Turbine Rotor$(/l) on the Turbine Rotor rod.
